metadata.title: CVE-2023-32181 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in openSUSE libeconf allows for DoS via malformed configuration files This issue affects libeconf: before 0.5.2.

criterions.comment: libeconf package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
